title: Doraemon: New Nobita's Great Demon - Peko and the Exploration Party of Five
genres: Family, Animation, Adventure, Fantasy, Comedy, Science Fiction
overview: Nobita finds a stray dog and brings him home, little does hi knows that the dog is actually a prince in his homeland, a world appart deep in the african 'Smokers Forest' were the dogs evolved and have their own empire, so he and his friends take on a journey to take back the young prince to his homeland but when they get there things have changed.
